body:
The problem seems to come from the \ sign that appears at line:


set gambv = `gensky $skypar | rcalc -i '# Ground ambient\ level: ${ga}' -e 
'$1=ga'`


Just replace this line by:


set gambv = `gensky $skypar | rcalc -i '# Ground ambient level: ${ga}' -e 
'$1=ga'`


and the script should work now...


Raphaël
___
